mapper.select: SELECT tb1.id, tb1.name, tb1.label, tb1.unit, tb1.agg_type, tb1.data_type, tb2.series_type, tb2.use_ratio, tb2.priority FROM ciams_data_attribute AS tb1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ciams_data_group_attribute AS tb2 ON tb1.id = tb2.data_attribute_id WHERE tb2.data_group_id = #{dataGroupId} ORDER BY priority
